name: Bumbling Bob's Grand Adventure
description:
Do you like escort missions? No? Then you are going to hate this game. Bob wants to be an adventurer, but he lacks certain skills. Your job is to manipulate the environment to keep Bob alive so that he can collect the treasure.

Game and all assets built from scratch in 48 Hours for LD46 by a husband and wife team.

Source Code at https://github.com/CrimsonShadow256/LD46
